snippet: Some of the largest brewers in the U.S. are trying to reduce their water-to-beer ratio as drought and wildfire threaten the watersheds where they draw billions of gallons every year....

headline.print_headline: Water Woes Force Big Brewers to Tighten the Tap
headline.main: Water Woes Force Big Brewers to Tighten the Tap

lead_paragraph: Some of the largest brewers in the U.S. are trying to reduce their water-to-beer ratio as drought and wildfire threaten the watersheds where they draw billions of gallons every year.
